submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m, n, hCut, vCut):
        order = []
        order += [(v, 0) for v in hCut]
        order += [(v, 1) for v in vCut]

        order.sort(reverse=True)
        
        cost = 0
        counts = [1, 1]

        for cut in order:
            cost += counts[cut[1]] * cut[0]
            counts[1 - cut[1]] += 1

        return cost
